annotation.spannedText: This is the most important aspect of dealing with rabies from a human point of view

classMention.mentionClass: This is the most important aspect of dealing with rabies from a human point of view

annotation.spannedText: This is believed to provide excellent cover for about 3 years

classMention.mentionClass: This is believed to provide excellent cover for about 3 years

annotation.spannedText: The bite should be well washed with water to remove as much saliva as possible from the area

classMention.mentionClass: The bite should be well washed with water to remove as much saliva as possible from the area

annotation.spannedText: If soap is used at this stage it must be well washed off before an antiseptic is applied to the area

classMention.mentionClass: If soap is used at this stage it must be well washed off before an antiseptic is applied to the area

annotation.spannedText: The area should then be covered and the patient should have post exposure vaccination as soon as possible

classMention.mentionClass: The area should then be covered and the patient should have post exposure vaccination as soon as possible

annotation.spannedText: ALL PATIENTS MUST OBTAIN SPECIALISED MEDICAL ATTENTION AND THE NOTES BELOW SHOULD ONLY BE USED AS AN OUTLINE

classMention.mentionClass: ALL PATIENTS MUST OBTAIN SPECIALISED MEDICAL ATTENTION AND THE NOTES BELOW SHOULD ONLY BE USED AS AN OUTLINE

annotation.spannedText: In severe proximal bites both should be administered as soon as possible following inoculation

classMention.mentionClass: In severe proximal bites both should be administered as soon as possible following inoculation

annotation.spannedText: In such situations, medical advice should be obtained immediately

classMention.mentionClass: In such situations, medical advice should be obtained immediately

annotation.spannedText: The administration of vaccine, and immunoglobulin if required, must be carried out, or directly supervised, by a physician

classMention.mentionClass: The administration of vaccine, and immunoglobulin if required, must be carried out, or directly supervised, by a physician

annotation.spannedText: Nibbling unbroken skin, Minor scratches without bleeding, Licks on broken skin Administer vaccine immediately

classMention.mentionClass: Nibbling unbroken skin, Minor scratches without bleeding, Licks on broken skin Administer vaccine immediately

annotation.spannedText: Single or multiple bites or scratches with skin penetration, Contamination of mucous membrane by saliva from licking Administer antirabies immunoglobulin and vaccine immediately

classMention.mentionClass: Single or multiple bites or scratches with skin penetration, Contamination of mucous membrane by saliva from licking Administer antirabies immunoglobulin and vaccine immediately

annotation.spannedText: Since elimination of the rabies virus at the site of infection by chemical or physical means is the most effective mechanism of protection, immediate vigorous washing and flushing with soap or detergent and water, or water alone, is imperative

classMention.mentionClass: Since elimination of the rabies virus at the site of infection by chemical or physical means is the most effective mechanism of protection, immediate vigorous washing and flushing with soap or detergent and water, or water alone, is imperative

annotation.spannedText: Following washing, apply either ethanol (70%) or tincture or aqueous solution of iodine or povidone iodine

classMention.mentionClass: Following washing, apply either ethanol (70%) or tincture or aqueous solution of iodine or povidone iodine

annotation.spannedText: As much as possible of the total RIG volume required should be instilled into the wound

classMention.mentionClass: As much as possible of the total RIG volume required should be instilled into the wound

annotation.spannedText: Urgent post-exposure treatment remains essential whether or not patients have been previously vaccinated

classMention.mentionClass: Urgent post-exposure treatment remains essential whether or not patients have been previously vaccinated
